title: that feel when you finally get out of bronze.

replies.body: .-. welcome to silver it only gets worse

Idk, but the toxicity can be found in any devision. It took me a month to climb out of b1 and its taken me half that time to get to my s4 -> s3 promos. I feel like in bronze I worry more about my own teammates being bad than my enemies being good, which makes it very difficult to carry games.

Those feeders in your promos:
http://www.gifbin.com/bin/320sw0sw7847.gif

That's assuming anyone could

No one escapes elohell.
https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQBi6RJyAAAoZUOIc0XFy9DrBKsowuWqr6-O_whHMGRAA_Ts_UPLA

i mean, all you gotta do is climb
http://i.imgur.com/M6tkmkP.gif
{{champion:111}}  forward... forward
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y-D15scgOEo
of course you can get out of bronze, there is always wood division
I just got out of bronze on Friday.

Silver is worse.

Most Bronze players are aware that they are bad.
Silver is where most of the toxic players end up.
That is so true... and I'll admit when I made Silver as a noob in my first season, and my brother was Bronze, I felt soooo proud, lol. Took me awhile to figure out I sucked so bad. xD
No one realizes how bad they were until they improve and look back

I got placed in Silver 1 during the first season I started ranked.
I thought I was good.

Now that I am Plat IV, I am pretty sure I can decimate my former self on my old mains while I play AD Soraka.
It is like looking back on your old Facebook posts and wondering why on Earth I would post something so stupid.

It is difficult for one to grasp how much he or she can improve.
Word. Ended the season silver 3. Placed in bronze 2, currently gold 2 :D
Only to realize Silver is another name for Bronze Round 2

So true.

Crawling through a mile of shit only to come out clean on the other side.
So I take it you have yet to discover that bronze is much less toxic than silver.

Its toxic at all levels, at least the higher you go the less stupid people play (at least in theory.)  In bronze people will be toxic when they have 3 cs/min and think that's completely pro level last hitting.  In bronze people will tell you to STFU when you recommend they don't build Rageblade on Braum or Malzahar (because "rageblade so broken".)  In bronze people will tell the other team to report you if you are opposed to starting baron with no ward coverage, no enemies dead and without even sweeping to see if the enemy has a ward in baron pit.

I'm fine with people raging at me when they're right but when they're horribly, horribly wrong it makes it that much worse.
and then u realize silver is bronze
Not as bad as Diamond 1 elo hell gg getting trolled every game
Great movie!
